title: Kim Kardashian shares more photos from baptism in Armenia... as star holds son Psalm, five months
text:
Last week she and her children were baptized while on her trip to her ancestral homeland of Armenia.

And on Monday morning, Kim Kardashian shared two more photos from the baptism to her Instagram page.

The 38-year-old mother of four was holding son Psalm, five months, in her hands while North and Saint looked on.

Inside look: Kim Kardashian shared two more photos from the baptism to her Instagram page on Monday morning

Kim shared the two images, tagging the photographer, Jackie Nickerson, in the captions.

Kim carried baby Psalm in her arms and smiled as someone sweetly put their hand on his head.

Kim styled her long brunette tresses in loose curls around her, opting for a brown hued turtleneck dress.

North, six, rocked a statement silver necklace with a cream ensemble while Saint, three, sported a white shirt.

Family: The 38-year-old mother of four was holding son Psalm, five months, in her hands while North and Saint looked on

On Friday, Kim revealed she was baptized along with her kids: 'Thank you Armenia for such a memorable trip. So blessed to have been baptized along with my babies at Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin, Armenia's main cathedral which is sometimes referred to as the Vatican of the Armenian Apostolic Church. This church was built in 303 AD,' adding the photo credit to Jackie.

The star shared pictures from the Orthodox Christian ceremony as she wore a traditional head scarf while wearing a high-neck long sleeved, full length dress.

Kim's younger children Saint, Chicago, 20 months, and Psalm were all welcomed into the Christian faith alongside her.

Four years prior, Kim and husband Kanye took daughter North to Jerusalem to have her baptized with sister Khloe Kardashian there to be her godmother.

Important day: On Friday, Kim revealed she was baptized along with her kids: 'Thank you Armenia for such a memorable trip. So blessed to have been baptized along with my babies at Mother See of Holy Etchmiadzin, Armenia's main cathedral which is sometimes referred to as the Vatican of the Armenian Apostolic Church. This church was built in 303 AD,' adding the photo credit to Jackie

Pose: The star shared pictures from the Orthodox Christian ceremony as she wore a traditional head scarf while wearing a high-neck long sleeved, full length dress; pictured with North

Homeland: Kim's younger children Saint, Chicago, 20 months, and Psalm were all welcomed into the Christian faith alongside her

On this occasion, Kim was in Armenia with sister Kourtney Kardashian and her three children: Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and Reign, four.

Kim shared her Instagram stories on Sunday night her visit to The Night of the Jacks in Calabasas.

The mother of four shared a variety of pictures from the outing to the Halloween wonderland to her Instagram stories, including a pumpkin that featured a carving of her and Kanye's face.

She also showed one that had Marilyn Monroe's face and her pals Chrissy Teigen and John Legend.

Spooky: Kim shared her Instagram stories on Sunday night her visit to The Night of the Jacks in Calabasas

The mother of four shared a variety of pictures from the outing to the Halloween wonderland to her Instagram stories, including a pumpkin that featured a carving of her and Kanye's face, as well as that of pals Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's faces

Intricate: She also showed one that had Marilyn Monroe's face
description: Last week she and her four children were baptized while on her trip to her ancestral homeland of Armenia. And on Monday morning, Kim Kardashian shared two more photos.
